page.title: 11My Hobby is Bowling
page.content: My club is called GKN SANKEYS.There are four teams.I play in the fourth team.In our area there are four leagues.Our team is in the third league.There are,in fact,two kinds of bowling games,flat and crown green bowls.I play crown green bowls. This game differs from flat green mainly because in flat green the ground is level.In crown green the ground has undulations. The idea of the game is to see who can place their bowls nearest to a small target ball which has been bowled a certain distance along the green. One day I would like to play in one of the biggest crown green competitions called the Yorkshire Bank held at Waterloo in Blackpool every year.
